article_title: Bill Maher Mocks Red States Who Benefitted From Obamacare -- But Voted Republican -- With 'New Rule'
article_text:
Talk about shooting yourself in the foot.

Counties in Arkansas, Kentucky and West Virginia that saw the largest bump in healthcare coverage for their citizens under Obamacare also voted to elect Republicans to Congress -- you know, the ones who want to repeal the Affordable Care Act.

In an exclusive "New Rule" above, Bill Maher tries to wrap his head around that by cracking a joke about the counteractive decision like only he would.

"Real Time With Bill Maher" airs Fridays at 10:00 p.m. ET on HBO.
